title: Day 1016
content:
# Day 1016

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*VgZmQml12bFTdS5Tb7ryNA.png)

By this time next year, **365 days**, **52 weeks**, **8,760 hours**, **525,600 minutes**, **31,536,000 seconds**, I want to have done the following:

Write one book filled with memes.

Continue writing everyday.

Continue reading one chapter everyday.

Be a more attentive Father.

Be a more attentive Husband.

Take a picture every morning with my shirt off and make a 365 day timelapse of the progress.

That's it. Pretty simple set of goals for the 2025 year. Let's do it.

1/1/25

Conor Jay Chepenik
